summary: This document is an email from Lesley Groff to Paul Morris regarding the cancellation of an appointment with Jeffrey Epstein. It indicates a rescheduling attempt for the meeting.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is communicating with Paul Morris about scheduling an appointment with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email and is being asked to reschedule an appointment with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the individual with whom the appointment was scheduled.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is likely an assistant or staff member coordinating schedules for Paul Morris.
Paul Morris has a scheduled appointment with Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a social or professional relationship.

events.title: Appointment Cancellation
events.description: Lesley Groff informs Paul Morris that his appointment with Jeffrey Epstein scheduled for 5:00 PM has been canceled.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff sent an email to Paul Morris regarding an appointment with Jeffrey Epstein.
The appointment scheduled for January 22, 2013, at 5:00 PM was canceled.
Lesley Groff proposed rescheduling the appointment for January 23, 2013, at 5:30 PM.
